products.title: Canon PowerShot SD1400 IS
products.description:
The Canon Powershot SD1400 IS is an entry level 14.1 megapixel compact digital camera. The SD1400 IS is equipped with a 28mm wide-angle lens, a 4X optical zoom and a 2.7inch LCD display. The SD1400 IS is less than one inch thick and has the ability to shoot 720p High Definition video.

The SD1400 IS features a number of settings to improve or enhance the quality of photos directly on the device.  Users have the ability to add effects to photos with the addition of Fish-eye and Miniature effect modes. Advancements to Canon's Smart Auto Mode increases the number of shooting scenarios where the camera can automatically adjust for movement and lighting. The SD1400 IS sports Smart Flash Exposure which automatically adds the correct level of flash for each setting. The camera includes several Face detection self-timer modes that can be triggered with either a wink or a smile. The SD1400 IS supports the high-spec SDXC memory cards with a maximum storage of two terabytes.

Features

  • 4X optical zoom
  • Dynamic mode for enhanced image stabilization when shooting movies
  • 14.1 megapixels to generate 16.5" X 23.4" prints
  • 28mm wide angle lens
  • 2.7 inch LCD display screen
  • HD video shooting
  • Digic 4 image processor with evolved face-detection
  • Fish-eye and Miniature effect modes
  • Smart Auto Mode
  • Servo AF-AE conditions
  • Smart Flash Exposure

Specs

  • Type of camera: Compact digital-still camera with built in flash
  • 14.1 megapixels
  • 1/2 3 inch type charge coupled device
  • 14.5 total pixels
  • 14.1 effect pixels
  • Focal length: 5.0(W) - 20(T) mm
  • 4X digital zoom
  • Focus range 1.2 - infinity (W),2.6ft - infinity (T)
  • Auto focus system: TTL autofocus system, manual focus
  • LCD monitor: 2.7 inch TFT
  • LCD pixels: Approx 230,000
  • Maximum aperture: F/2.8 (W) - F/5.9 (T)
  • Shutter speed 1- 1/ 1500sec

pros.text: adjustable display brightness
compact - very small, lightweight, and the thinnest PowerShot to date
good build quality - enclosure is mostly metal
captures video in 720p high definition
fair speeds - fast to startup and shutdown, focus
good image quality for a basic point & shoot camera
affordable price point
Mini-HDMI output for directly displaying photos and playing back video onto compatible HDTVs and displays
accepts affordable, easy to find and capacious SD/SDHC/SDXC flash storage

cons.text: flash and microphone are easily blocked by a stray finger
basic point & shoot camera - poorer 4x optical zoom, low resolution 2.7" display, etc..
nearly identical to previous generation models
slight delay between hitting the shutter button and the actual image being taken

related.title: Canon PowerShot SD1100 IS
related.description:
The Canon PowerShot SD1100 IS is a digital camera from the PowerShot Series and is available in a variety of different colours. It features an 8.0 megapixel CCD and 3x optical image-stabilized zoom. As with many of the PowerShot series of cameras, the SD1100 IS comes equipped with Face and Motion Detection technology to accurately capture colours and minimize picture blurring. It has a 2.5-inch LCD II screen and the DIGIC III image processor.

Features:

  • 8.0 megapixel CCD
  • 3x optical image-stabilized zoom
  • Face Detection and Motion Detection
  • 2.5-inch LCD II screen
  • DIGIC III image processor
  • Available in 'Rhythm and Blue', 'Swing Silver', 'Pink Melody', 'Bohemian Brown' and 'Golden Tone' colours

pros.text: capable of high-resolution image capture, pictures are big and detailed
compact design fits in a pocket comfortably, easy to carry around
menus and interface is logical and intuitive
aluminum body feels solid, no flex or creaking
automatically adjusts for all kinds of lighting conditions
image stabilization is excellent, completely accounts for unsteady hands

cons.text: too slow to catch fast-moving action
no manual control over aperture, shutter speed, focus

related.title: Canon PowerShot SD1300 IS
related.description:
The Canon Powershot SD1300 IS is an entry level 12.1 megapixel compact digital camera. The SD1300 IS is equipped with a 28mm wide-angle lens, a 4X optical zoom and a 2.7 inch Pure Color System LCD display.

The SD1300 IS features a number of settings to improve or enhance the quality of photos directly from the device. Users have the ability to add effects to photos with the addition of Fish-eye and Miniature effect modes. Advancements to Canon's unique Smart Auto Mode increases the number of shooting scenarios where the camera can automatically adjust for movement and lighting. The SD1300 IS supports SDXC memory cards with a maximum storage of two terabytes.

Features

  • 4X optical zoom
  • 12.1 megapixels
  • 28mm wide angle lens
  • 2.7-inch LCD display screen
  • Fish-eye and Miniature effect modes
  • Smart Auto Mode

Specs

  • Type of camera: Compact digital-still camera with built in flash
  • 12.1 megapixels
  • 1/2 3 inch type charge coupled device
  • 12.7 total pixels
  • 12.1 effect pixels
  • Focal length: 5.0(W) - 20(T) mm
  • 4X digital zoom
  • Focus range 1.2" - infinity (W), 1.6 ft - infinity (T)
  • Auto focus system: TTL autofocus system, manual focus
  • LCD monitor: 2.7-inch
  • LCD pixels: Approx 230,000
  • Maximum aperture: F/2.8(W) - F/5.9 (T)
  • Shutter speed 1- 1/ 1500sec  15- 1/ 1500 sec
  • Flash range: 12in- 13ft(W) 1.6- 6.6F (T)
  • Recycling time: 10 sec or less
  • Flash exposure: +/-2 stops in 1/3 stop increments

pros.text: Simple to use, pretty much the essential point-and-shoot
Lens glass quality is good for this price range, little distortion or colour fringing comparatively
Fast start-up time, takes about 1 second from off to shutter action.
Long battery life, typically between 300 and 400 shots including flash use
Autofocus works quickly for a point-and-shoot
Good low-light shots, rarely any noise

cons.text: Manually adjustable settings (such as contrast, lighting, flash adjustment) take several menu clicks and time to access

related.title: Canon PowerShot SD3500 IS
related.description:
The Canon Powershot SD3500 IS is an entry level 14.1 megapixel compact digital camera. The SD3500 IS is equipped with a 24mm ultra-wide angle lens, a 5X optical zoom and a 3.5 inch touch screen LCD display. Canon has also added a Touchscreen LCD display so that the user can customize their photo settings by simply dragging  icons to separate desired onscreen locations.

The SD3500 IS features a number of settings to improve or enhance the quality of photos directly on the device. Users have the ability to add effects to photos with the addition of Fish-eye and Miniature effect modes. Advancements to Canon's unique Smart Auto Mode increases the number of shooting scenarios where the camera can automatically adjust for movement and lighting. The SD3500 IS sports Smart Flash Exposure which automatically adds the correct level of flash for each setting. The camera includes several Face detection self-timer modes that can be triggered with either a wink or a smile. The camera also offers the ability to shoot 720p High Definition video. The SD3500 IS supports the high-spec SDXC memory cards with a maximum storage of two terabytes while users that wish to connect via wireless data transfer can connect directly to PCs as the camera is Eye-Fi memory card compatible.

Features

  • 5X optical zoom
  • Dynamic mode for enhanced image stabilization when shooting movies
  • 14.1 megapixels to generate 16.5" X 23.4" prints
  • 24mm wide angle lens
  • 3.5-inch LCD touch screen
  • HD video shooting
  • Digic 4 image processor with evolved face-detection
  • Fish-eye and Miniature effect modes
  • Smart Auto Mode
  • Servo AF-AE conditions
  • Smart Flash Exposure

Specs

  • Type of camera: Compact digital-still camera with built in flash
  • 14.1 megapixels
  • 1/2 3 inch type charge coupled device
  • 14.5 total pixels
  • 14.1 effect pixels
  • Focal length: 5.0(W) - 20(T) mm
  • 5X digital zoom
  • Focus range 2" - infinity (W), 3.ft-infinity (T)
  • Auto focus system: TTL autofocus system, manual focus
  • LCD monitor: 3.5-inch touch screen
  • LCD pixels: Approx 461,000 dots
  • Shutter speed 1- 1/ 3000sec 15- 1/ 3000 sec
  • Recycling time: 12 sec or less
  • Flash exposure: +/-2 stops in 1/3 stop increments
